thread.title: A gem in NYC!
thread.title_full: A gem in NYC! - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: hp81
title: A gem in NYC!
text: My daughter and I stayed here for shopping and a show while home for college. The hotel had incredible staff and service. Every part of the hotel the employees were very attentive. My daughter was not feeling great during our stay and they offered tea and biscuits to make her feel better. It was an expensive stay compared to staying in soho but the area is just the best I think of NYC. Will come back!
